page.title: 06DAIRYLAND ICE CREAM FACTORY
page.content: We visited Dairyland{ice cream}factory on Norwich Road. Dairy land{export only to North sea oil rigs.Over 100 people are dependent on the company. The factory building is 20'x 80'.The ice cream they produce is sold in Norwich,Kings Lynn,Ipswich, Cambridge and London.In these places they also have ice cream vans.Norwich has 30 vans.Norwich area has only one factory which has been running for 30 years. Dairyland was not always Dairy land,it was once Reeves ice-cream.The special machine which makes ice-cream is only 1 of 4 like it in the world,it makes 1000 4 litre tubs in 1 hour.Another machine makes 110 2 ball screw balls a minute.The factory makes 18 different flavoured ice-creams.The recipe for Dairyland ice-cream is sugar, powdered milk and fat,for flavoured ice-creams flavouring is added.
